content: अमनस्, --अमनस्क {%<ab>a.</ab>%} {@--1@} Without the organ of desire, thought &c. {@--2@} Devoid of intellect (as a child). {@--3@} Inattentive, careless. {@--4@} Having no control over the mind. {@--5@} Devoid of affection. {%--<ab>n.</ab>%} (--नः) {@--1@} Not the organ of desire, non-perception. {@--2@} Inattention. {%--<ab>m.</ab>%} The Supreme Being.
